Nightlight/Trinity::

"I Like GO" said firmly Trinity.

"No Trinity, you can't... Aerotaur said" replied Nightlight

"But Uncle Aeortaur will need my help!!!" cried Trinity

"You can help him keeping the external defencences online " said 
Nighlight.

Trinity didn't say more and she went to a corner to layed down. Since 
Aerotaur went to fight Outside, she liked go and help him She didn't 
know how but she would go to help him. Nightlight was cheking the 
extarnal defences.
